entry.title: Sunday: Rain or snow. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow mixed with rain this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023
